"Need I remind anyone how many times "science" has been wrong--over and ove=
r and over--it's a freaking useless discipline, all it does is build egos!"=


Anybody see a problem with this line of thinking?=C2=A0 Anybody see the p=
ure insanity of that said as a factual statement?=C2=A0 Modern Medicine? LO=
L=C2=A0 Ummmmmm basic Physics?=C2=A0 It would be insane, more than that, as=
inine to say that Science has never helped mankind or is a worthless endeav=
or.=C2=A0 <<<<<< Wasted space even having to write the words out.=C2=A0 It =
is unquestionable, on the whole.=C2=A0 

I have seen several bright minds a=
sk for more information.=C2=A0 Studies that are quoted from and "EVP Expert=
s"=C2=A0 Yet I am seeing that information slow to come forth.

You are very=
 correct.=C2=A0 Science has been wrong many times before.=C2=A0 But, it is =
always self correcting.=C2=A0=C2=A0Not because of ego, but because of the v=
ery reason you are mad at it.=C2=A0 It is an unrelenting, cold-hearted swam=
p bitch! LOL =C2=A0 Science is not a thing that cares about what you want o=
r think you hear.=C2=A0 It cares about verifiable, commendable and repeatab=
le evidence.

The problem you are having, well other than not getting the T=
horizie shots on time LOL=C2=A0 Might be, the about lack of logic in the th=
eory to begin with.=C2=A0 

What you are doing is going from point (A) to p=
oint (C)=C2=A0 And never taking a real hard look at point (B)=C2=A0 Now, yo=
u are an electrician guy.=C2=A0 You of all people understand the idea of ci=
rcuits and connections and flow.=C2=A0 The same thing works in Logic and Sc=
ience.

POINT (A)=C2=A0 I am taking a constantly scaning radio and getting =
voices.

POINT (C)=C2=A0 They are talking to me and making sense.=C2=A0 The=
y are telling me all kinds of information that no one could ever know, at l=
east as=C2=A0I perceive it.

Now here is the real kicker!

POINT (B)=C2=A0 =
Yeah this is the hard one.=C2=A0 How do you know they are taking to you?=C2=
=A0 You do understand the nature of the human mind and how it works?=C2=A0 =
Do you understand that this information is nothing new and it dates back to=
 the year 1956? (I am thinking)=C2=A0 

How do you get past point (B)?=C2=
=A0 Do you except it on faith?=C2=A0 That is a Religion.=C2=A0 Can=C2=A0we =
study it as a Science?=C2=A0 

And if we come to our own conclusions about =
things are we not all heretics in the school of "Frank"=C2=A0 Maybe the wor=
d "Church" would be better LOL

Get me past point (B) and I will lead the c=
harge against the ignorant Scientific / Skeptic assholes out to get FRANK.
=

Till then, there are problems with logic.

=C2=A0"Nature is showing us onl=
y the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to it eve=
n though, because of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itself all at=
 once." 
-=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein 


"It is far better to grasp the unive=
rse as it really is than to persist in delusions, however satisfying and re=
assuring."
--Carl Sagan


"There is no such thing as an insignificant detai=
l. Don't just look 
for what you want to find."
-- Me LOL

<TD vAlign=3Dtop>From what you've posted so far, it sounds like an interes=
ting effort, and I look forward to reading the entire study.<BR><BR>Also, f=
rom what you posted, it did not say they didn't use double-blind testing. I=
t says one of the reasons they do not consider the current radio-sweep clai=
ms reliable, is that those making those claims do not do double blind tests=
.  <BR><BR>So if you are calling BS and clueless those who are not doi=
ng double blind testing, that begs the question - are you?

<DIV>&=
nbsp;It's probably not kosher to post this, but I find this highly insultin=
g to all of us. As usual, igonore all facts and all other methods, such as =
EVPmaker, which forms all the voices inside the computer. Ignore all p=
hone EVP messages, ignore all voices heard with no electronic aids. Ignore =
messages received via turned off TV and printers--and on and on, yet they k=
now all about EVP..Ignore the fact that probably thousands use boxes succes=
sfully.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>"We have conducted a few listening stu=
dies of reported radio-sweep EVP and the results have not been good. We hav=
e also worked with a variety of such devices. Based on what we know about t=
rans-etheric influences, how EVP and visual forms of ITC are formed and wha=
t we know about mediumship, it is difficult to fit radio-sweep into any est=
ablished hypothesis. Without solid research supporting it as producing EVP,=
 it is impossible for us to recommend it or support its use. If there were =
double-blind studies conducted by experienced researchers that shows it doe=
s produce phenomena, we would gladly promote it as an alternative technique=
.<BR> <BR>We are pretty sure that, in transform EVP (ordinary recorder=
), the voice is formed in the electronics by transforming available audio-f=
requency noise in an active part of the electronics such as a transistor ju=
nction. We think the process is amplification of a weak telekinetic signal =
via stochastic resonance
 and we have found that the optimum audio-frequenc=
y signal for this is a chaotic one rich in voice-frequencies with many tran=
sient perturbation. That is our working hypothesis. "</DIV>
<DIV> </DI=
V>
<DIV> I can't say who this is from, cuz almost certain I'd get sued=
. There's no double blind testing their BS either. Clueless!!</DIV>

bsp;</DIV>

<P>When=

ver be fully understood the crap gets deep. I love these so called experts =

ause im physic"=E2=80=A6.in one ear and out the other. Everyone is an exper=
t these days and most of what they say is BS. If I start hearing someone or=

Sounds like these so called experts are just trying to deter and silence an=
ything they dont agree with by doing there Scientific tests. If it works it=
 works and if it didnt work what the hell are we all still doing
 here. </P=
